name: Coding Break-Out
description:
Bepary Games

Coding Break-Out

Game information/description

Remind yourself of the classic games but in a better way. BreakOut is now in Full HD and it's free. Destroy those bricks and crash the game. Show what you can do. And find out the cheats!

Controls

  • Left and right arrow keys to move.
  • Space bar to throw the ball.
  • P to pause the game.
  • E to exit the game.
  • R to restart the level.
  • M to go to the main menu.

System requirements:

Windows:

  • Windows Xp or above
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics
  • 1GHz CPU

Mac OS X:

  • Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard
  • 1GB RAM
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Ubuntu:

  • Ubuntu 14 or above
  • OpenGL-capable graphics card with valid driver
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

Note: this game runs only on Windows but you can use Wine to use this game on other platforms.

Some of the resources in this game might be from other publishers. This game is for educational purposese only.
